name: Microsoft Copilot
description: Microsoft Copilot is an AI-powered assistant enhancing productivity across Microsoft 365 and web tasks.
longDescription: Microsoft Copilot is an AI-driven platform integrated with Microsoft 365, designed to streamline work and personal tasks by leveraging advanced language models like GPT-4o. It serves as a conversational assistant, helping users draft documents, analyze data, and automate workflows within applications like Word, Excel, and Teams. The website aims to boost productivity by offering contextual insights, task automation, and seamless collaboration tools. It caters to both individual users and enterprises, providing scalable solutions for business processes. Copilot also supports web interactions, such as browsing and booking, making it a versatile tool for daily life and professional needs. Its mission is to transform workflows with AI, ensuring security and user control.
features: Copilot Chat generates context-aware responses to user queries, enhancing productivity in Microsoft 365 apps.
Deep Research analyzes web sources and documents to provide comprehensive answers for complex tasks.
Copilot Vision interprets on-screen content, answering questions about websites or documents in real time.
Autonomous Agents automate repetitive tasks like data entry or CRM updates, saving time for users.
Multi-Agent Orchestration enables collaborative AI agents to handle complex workflows across platforms.
Narrative Builder creates compelling presentations from user prompts and files, streamlining content creation.
Copilot Notebooks in OneNote compile diverse content for real-time insights and audio overviews.
Computer Use allows agents to interact with desktop and web apps, automating UI-based tasks.

faqs.question: What is Microsoft Copilot used for?
faqs.answer: Microsoft Copilot is an AI assistant that enhances productivity by helping users draft documents, analyze data, automate tasks, and interact with web content within Microsoft 365 and beyond.

faqs.question: Is Microsoft Copilot free to use?
faqs.answer: Copilot offers a free tier with limited access to core features, while premium features are available through subscriptions like Copilot Pro or Microsoft 365 licenses.

faqs.question: How does Copilot integrate with Microsoft 365?
faqs.answer: Copilot embeds AI capabilities into apps like Word, Excel, and Teams, providing contextual suggestions, data analysis, and task automation within these tools.

faqs.question: Can Copilot access web content?
faqs.answer: Yes, Copilot can browse websites, perform tasks like booking reservations, and analyze on-screen content with user permission through features like Copilot Vision.

faqs.question: Is my data secure with Copilot?
faqs.answer: Microsoft prioritizes security with features like Microsoft Purview Information Protection, ensuring sensitive data is classified and protected during AI interactions.

faqs.question: What is Copilot Studio?
faqs.answer: Copilot Studio is a low-code platform for building custom AI agents that integrate with Microsoft 365 and external data to automate business processes.

faqs.question: Does Copilot support voice commands?
faqs.answer: Yes, Copilot Voice allows hands-free interaction, enabling users to ask questions or dictate tasks using natural language.
